description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Go head-to-head against an alien menace, and command your own space fleet in this fast-paced tactical shooter.  Spatial Rift has a single player campaign, survival mode, and online play with or against friends.
description.short: Go head-to-head against an alien menace, and command your own space fleet in this fast-paced tactical shooter.  Spatial Rift has a single player campaign, survival mode, and online play with or against friends.
